name: dining
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
present participle of
dine
to eat the main meal of the day, usually in the evening: I hate dining alone. We dined by candlelight. He once dined with the president of France.

dine and dash
informal to eat a meal in a restaurant and then leave without paying: If you dine and dash you risk being arrested.
Phrasal verbs
dine on/upon something
dine out
dine out on something
